dmca.title: [EV1-C1635376B] Piracy site in your netblock
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [EV1-C1635376B] Piracy site in your netblock
Subject: [EV1-C1635376B] Piracy site in your netblock


==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Piracy site in your netblock
Added by system at Wednesday, Nov 1 2006 10:27 pm
X-MailFrom: cam@burroak.on.ca

<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Wed Nov 1 22:27:56 2006

 (Exim)
 id 1GfUAM-0001bE-4V
 for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 01 Nov 2006 22:26:58 -0600

        with esmtp (Exim) 
        id 1GfUAJ-000HmA-H2

  (Vircom SMTPRS 4.4.543.0) with ESMTP id <B0261980303@mx1.ripnet.com>

  Wed, 1 Nov 2006 23:26:51 -0500
X-Modus-BlackList: 66.78.121.150=OK;cam@burroak.on.ca=OK

To: abuse@theplanet.com
From: Cam Stevenson <cam@burroak.on.ca>
Subject: Piracy site in your netblock

Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 64.235.198.10 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of burroak.on.ca)
client-ip=64.235.198.10; envelope-from=cam@burroak.on.ca;
helo=mx1.ripnet.com;
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Nov 2006 04:26:58.0350 (UTC)
FILETIME=[22953CE0:01C6FE37] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Good day, 
 
A review of our web logs shows an extremely large amount of referrer   
traffic generated by images embedded by the site "www.ce4arab.com".    
Investigation showed that this site is conducting significant piracy   
of many products, including our own. 
 
The offending URL: 
 
http://www.ce4arab.com/vb7/showthread.php?t=69655 
 
This site appears to be hosted by your organization.  Your attention   
to this matter is appreciated. 
 
Regards, 
 
Cam Stevenson
Burr Oak Software
